name: BigBags
title: 空间技术
title_original: Big Bags (more space in bags +longer reach)
author: BinbinHfr
description: 更大的空间、物品堆叠上限、探云手（交互距离、包裹、工具栏、机器人储物空间等等。需要通过科技逐步解锁）
description_original: Big bags everywhere ! More space in inventory, toolbelt, logistic and trash slots, robots cargo size and speed, bigger stacks & pickstick to increase your picking distance...
